mdRecord.dcterms:title: Discours merueilleux de la vie, actions & deportemens de Catherine de Medicis Royne mere: auquel sont recitez les moyens qu'elle a tenu pour vsurper le gouuernement du Royaume de France, & ruiner l'estat d'iceluy
Discours merveilleux de la vie, actions & deportemens de Catherine de Medicis Royne mere
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estienne, Henri, 1531-1598 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First ed., according to Brunet, who questions the attribution to Estienne. Work has also been attributed to Théodore de Bèze or Jean de Serres. I. Gentillet sometimes cited as co-author with Estienne. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Lortic. Bookplates of Margarita Cattanea and of Petri Ginori Conti. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 477. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Catherine de Médicis, Queen, consort of Henry II, King of France, 1519-1589
France--History--Charles IX, 1560-1574
